profile_positions.description:
Set up and deploy the global sales enablement capability and platform in all Philips direct and indirect sales organizations which enables sales to deliver on our solution promise. Results are an improved sales productivity by reducing preparation time for customer meeting with 58%, enabling sales to have right audience-challenge based engagements impacting our win-rate and improve the return on marketing investment. The capability strengthened the collaboration between marketing and sales improving our customer engagement effectiveness. 

Extra: set up of first of kind strategic partnership in Eastern Europe, European Healthtech Innovation Center with 150+‘hospitals, industrial partners, government and academic partners. Goal is to achieve smart specialization in healthcare improving health and well-being while making the healthcare process more efficient.

profile_positions.description:
Healthcare Informatics, systems and services (HISS) is a new Business Group (BG) within Philips,that addresses opportunities arising from rapid changes in the healthcare industry and the increasing importance of technologies like mobile devices, the cloud, social media, big data and the internet of things. Goal is to become the world’s innovative leader enabling the shift of emphasis from volume to value for care and from singular focus on clinical outcomes to a more holistic approach to population health leveraging mobile- and digital technologies that will help creating more convenience, transparency and efficiency in the total healthcare landscape. This will lead to new care models that echo the consumerized experiences of other transformed industries like banking. HISS businesses are increasingly connected with the Philips HealthSuite Digital Platform as the no 1 enabling patient-centric platform of choice in the industry. 
My responsibilities are:
- Setup go-to-market- and business models including digital touch points strategies for for new digital propositions  
- Build a strong digital relationship program with developers and partners. In this we focus on setting up our developer online community/portal, developer tools online, support commercial relation with developers (co-creation with key customers and partners) and hackatons
- Contribute to HISS marketing plan and -strategy 
- set up digital HISS lead generation, lead management 
- Improve digital (sales & marketing) capabilities following Philips digital processes, best practices and central tools and policies
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Lead

profile_positions.description:
These jobs embraced enabling Philips HC businesses to set up their digital strategy, create user tested and business case validated digital innovation prototypes (user centric & solutions based value propositions enriched with digital elements as mobile, big data analytics, connectivity and social media) as well as enabling the market organisations to market, sell and maintain digital propositions in their market. 

Next to that manage the definition and adoption of Market to Order (M2O) processes, support E2E business/market transformations, help business and markets to improve their commercial and digital capabilities and build a catalogue of solutions and best practices that delivers sustainable business impact.
profile_positions.title: Director commercial Excellence & Lead Digital Propositions program

profile_positions.description: This job embraced the facilitating of Philips businesses in exploiting digital (connected) domain ecosystem based product/service solutions and belonging business model to generate new (recurring) revenue streams and also laying the foundation for a Philips wide integrated service desk as competence centre for service business model design. Examples are mobile and connected solutions for smart home, smart store, smart building, smart hospital and digital ecosystems for Home HealthCare. Won global Philips IT innovation award 2012, given by CEO Frans van Houten and CIO Jeroen Tas.
